description: The States must do more to meet recommendations made by the Jersey Care Inquiry, an audit finds.
title: Jersey government at risk of 'inefficient' complaints handling
title_page: Jersey government at risk of 'inefficient' complaints handling - BBC News
maintext: The Customer Feedback Policy was launched in response to critiques made by the Audit Office in 2018 which highlighted "the time taken to respond to and the lack of evidence of learning and sharing from complaints".
